sentences.en: ...his tolerance and understanding of diverse human nature.
sentences.cn: …他对各种人性的宽容和理解。

sentences.en: As with any drug taken in excess, your body can build up a tolerance to it.
sentences.cn: 和过量服用任何其他药物一样，身体会对它产生耐药性。

sentences.en: Billy is on the side of the angels when it comes to racial tolerance.
sentences.cn: 说起种族间的包容，比利可真是宅心仁厚。

sentences.en: He has a low ceiling of tolerance.
sentences.cn: 他的容忍力很低[气量小].

sentences.en: He has a sense of humour plus tolerance and patience.
sentences.cn: 他具有幽默感又能宽容和忍耐.

sentences.en: Her toleration of his brazen attitude is enough to show her great tolerance.
sentences.cn: 她容忍了他厚颜无耻的态度，足以显示她的宽容。

sentences.en: Human beings have limited tolerance of noise.
sentences.cn: 人类对噪音的忍耐力有限.

sentences.en: In some communities there is a particular need to develop tolerance and improve race relations.
sentences.cn: 某些社区亟需发扬宽容精神，改善种族关系。

sentences.en: It has a tolerance of 0.001 of an inch.
She had no tolerance for jokes of any kind.
Some children have a low tolerance for boredom.
sentences.cn: 一些孩子很难忍受无聊.

sentences.en: The Prime Minister said he was trying to preach peace and tolerance to his people.
sentences.cn: 首相表示他在竭力向他的人民宣传和平和宽容。

sentences.en: There is lowered pain tolerance, lowered resistance to infection.
sentences.cn: 对疼痛的忍耐力降低了，对感染的抵抗力也减弱了。

sentences.en: This tolerance has continued right up until the present day.
sentences.cn: 这一宽容态度一直延续至今.

sentences.en: Tolerance is a sign of breeding.
sentences.cn: 容忍是有良好教养的表现.

words.tran_cn: 宽容的；容忍的；有耐药力的
相当地；可容忍地；差不多地

phrases.tran_cn: 葡萄糖耐量；葡萄糖耐受性
安装公差；定位公差；位置公差
耐温性；耐热性；温度容限
耐受度；宽容度；允许的辐射级
零容忍；零允差；绝不容忍

trans.tran_cn: 宽容，容忍，限度，公差，耐药量，耐药性
trans.tran_en: willingness to allow people to do, say, or believe what they want without criticizing or punishing them
